accountDetails.title: Complete your account details
accountDetails.description: We require the account holder contact details to inform you of any changes
accountDetails.name: Full name

agentRegister.title: Do you want to register as an agent?
agentRegister.description: If you want to represent another business (either as a professional surveyor, an accountant, friend, or relative), we will give you a unique agent code. You will need to give this code to that business so they can appoint you to speak for them.

accommodationNumber.title: How many visitor accommodations do you have to register?
accommodationNumber.description: Please declare each visitor accommodation sepeparately, if they're based in a different location and/or they have a different address

signIn.title: Sign in
signIn.description: Please enter your login details. If you have forgotten your password, please select the 'Forgot Password' button.

accommodationOperator.title: Are you the operator for these visitor accommodations?
accommodationOperator.description: An operator is the person who enters into the Accommodation Supply Contact with a Visitor.
accommodationOperator.description2: By clicking yes we will use your account details as to pre-populate some of this information.

accommodationContact.title: Will you be the authoirsed contact for these visitor accommodations
accommodationContact.description: An authorised contact is the person who we should contact for any issues with the accommodation.
accommodationContact.description2: By clicking yes we will use your account details as to pre-populate some of this information.
